### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(41, -82)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) and another burner inserter at position(x=41.5 y=-78.5)
-  Another stone furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(106, -32)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0) and steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5) and another pipe group at position(x=105.5 y=-32.5)
-  Electricity group (position x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668)

### Transport belt system at position(40, -83)
Consists of belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5) and transport belts at positions(x=63.5 y=-53.5) and (x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors due to lack of fuel
-  Ensure that burner mining drills, stone furnaces, and boilers have a sufficient fuel supply before starting operations.
-  Regularly check the status of these entities to prevent downtime due to lack of fuel.

### Errors due to missing ingredients
-  Ensure that stone furnaces have the necessary ingredients before starting operations.
-  Regularly check the status of these entities to prevent downtime due to missing ingredients.

### Errors due to disconnection from electric network
-  Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electric network before starting operations.
-  Regularly check the status of these entities to prevent downtime due to disconnection.

### Errors due to entities not being plugged into the electric network
-  Ensure that entities that require electricity are properly plugged into the electric network before starting operations.
-  Regularly check the status of these entities to prevent downtime due to lack of electricity.

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined or invoked in the given execution logs. 
Important variables that have been assigned include:
* Entity positions (e.g. x=41.0 y=-82.0)
* Entity statuses (e.g. EntityStatus.NO_FUEL, EntityStatus.WORKING)
* Entity types (e.g. burner-mining-drill, stone-furnace, offshore-pump)
